She's going to renovate a space in her home to be able to serve her customers and not have to pay rent.  This way she'll keep on striving to achieve her big dream of having a spa.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs

loans.name: Raul

texts.es:
Raúl, es muy emprendedor, el vive en la ciudad de Nasca, vive al lado de su pareja, quien lo apoya mucho en su negocio, ellos trabajan juntos siempre, Raul nos comenta que no se separan para nada, el nos dice que es su brazo derecho y que ella le da fuerzas para continuar. Raúl se dedica a su negocio de venta de ropa y lenceria para damas, caballeros y niños, viene trabajando en este negocio alrededor de 20 años y aprendió el manejo del mismo, debido a que desde pequeño ayudaba a su padre que también tiene este tipo de negocio, Raul se esfuerza mucho trabaja alrededor de 10 horas diarias y cuando son fechas de épocas festivas a veces no va a su casa a almorzar, con tal de seguir vendiendo sus productos y tener más ingresos para su familia, el y su esposa se sacrifican mucho por salir adelante 

Raul está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva ya que con la ayuda brindada el podrá comprar más mercadería (ropas de baño, lencería de verano, entre otros), esta mejora ayudara a que tenga más variedad de productos que ofrecer, y así obtener más ingresos para seguir ahorrando y cumplir su gran sueño: “Crecer aun mas en su Negocio y Familia
texts.en:
Raúl is very enterprising.  He lives in the city of Nazca with his wife, who helps him a lot in his business.  They always work together.  Raúl says they're never apart for any reason: she's his right arm and she gives him the strength to go on.

Raúl makes a living selling clothing and underwear for women, men, and children.  He has been in this business for around 20 years.  He learned a lot about running this business because since he was little he has helped his father, who is also in this line of work.

Raúl works very hard about 10 hours a day.  Sometimes, during the holidays, he doesn't go home for lunch: he continues selling his products to earn more income for his family.  He and his wife make a lot of sacrifices to get ahead.

Raúl's very grateful to the Kiva lenders because with their help he'll be able to buy more bathing suits, summer lingerie, and other merchandise.

This improvement will help him have greater product variety and earn more income.  He'll continue saving money so he can achieve his big dream of growing more in his business and his family.

loans.use: to buy underwear, bathing suits, and other clothing

loans.name: Marife

texts.en: Marife helps her husband to earn money in many ways. She has been working in a private company and has had help working the farm on weekends. She used her previous loan from GDMPC to buy fertilizer and has successfully repaid it. Marife and her husband plan to engage another line of business, so they paid their current loan earlier in order to request a higher amount . Without hesitation, she borrowed a new loan to buy a motorcycle to use for a transportation business. She hopes to expand their farm and become successful in their business.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle

loans.name: Hilda Marina

texts.es: Hilda, tiene 30 años de edad,vive en  unión libre con su esposo con quien tiene 3 hijos y  vive en el municipio de la Másica,Atlantida. Ella tiene su propio  negocio de una pulpería y venta de comida como pastelitos baleadas, tajadas  etc. este negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa desde hace 2 años,en la pulperia vende frijoles, pan, condimentos, churros, queso, embutidos y carnes. El préstamo que solicita es por 4,500 lempiras para comprar abarrotería Como granos basicos,churros,condimentos,carnes y otros para surtir la pulpería y poder ofrecer mejor variedad de productos. Tiene como meta ampliar su negocio para  darles una mejor educación a su hijos.
texts.en:
Hilda, 30, lives in the town of La Masica, Altántida, in a common-law marriage with her husband, with whom she has three children.

Hilda has had her own business in her house for two years, a grocery store where sells beans, bread, condiments, chips, cheese, cold cuts, and meat.  She also sells fried empanadas, "baleadas" [folded flour tortillas with fillings], fried plantains, and other food.

The loan Hilda's requesting is for 4,500 lempiras [HNL] to buy basic grains, chips, condiments, meat, and other groceries to stock her store and offer a greater variety of products.

Her goal is to expand her business so she can give her children a better education.

loans.use: to buy groceries for her store

loans.name: Nora

texts.en:
Nora is 42 years old and married with three children who are in school. Nora works very hard to provide for them.

Nora runs a construction supplies business in the Philippines and requested a 10,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to buy additional items like galvanized iron, plastic pipes, wires, etc.

Nora has been in this business for five years.

In the future, Nora would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items like galvanized iron, plastic pipes, wires, etc.

loans.name: Dita

texts.en:
Dita lives in Bogor, a suburban area located about an hour from Jakarta. Dita and three other family members live together in her house. She is an entrepreneur who runs a small stall that sells snacks, cell phone accessories, mobile phone airtime credits, and bill payment service for her customers. Previously, she took a working capital loan from Kiva and she already paid it back on time. 

Dita is taking another loan from Kiva because she sees sales opportunity on weekends as more customers come to her small shop to buy mobile phone airtime credits. For the last three months, she processed around $100-$101/day sales just from selling mobile phone airtime credits. Dita hopes that she can improve the small stall she runs and put aside the extra cash for her family saving. Dita thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales and bill payment transactions

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie, age 33, is single. She owns and operates a retail store for almost a year; in this business, she's earning a net income of PHP 500 daily. Her profits are usually spent on her retail store and food allowances on her parents.
Due to financial constraints, she would like to avail a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase beverages, coffee, biscuits, canned goods, and cooking oil to sell. 

She's hoping that her requested loan will be granted by some generous lenders so that she can improve her business to make it more profitable.

loans.use: To purchase beverages, coffee, biscuits, canned goods, and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Khaled

texts.en:
Khaled asked his son to  take his place in the picture as he is taking this loan for the son's study fees. 

Khaled was born in 1968. He is living in a sector in Jordan called Rsaifeh with his wife and three sons. He currently works as an electrician and is trying his best to provide his children with the best education. One of his sons is studying for the Bachelors’ degree, majoring in Marketing and Hotel Management, and he is in his second year. His son is planning to find a job that suits his study field after graduation in order to start supporting his family financially. 

But because Khaled is currently facing a financial crisis which is not helping him to pay for his sons’ upcoming semester fees, he has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for his son's upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Milkah

texts.en:
Milkah is a farmer and a resident of Kisii. She has two children. She has been a farmer for five years, producing and selling milk and eggs. In farming, she enjoys tending and feeding her livestock. Her biggest challenges are livestock diseases.

Milkah chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan as they will give her a dairy loan and their loans have low interest rates. During the training given, she learned how to do agriculture commercially. She said that this loan will give her family more milk and the income from the sale of milk will improve their living standards.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Issakha

texts.fr: Issakha est un cultivateur âgé de 58 ans, il est marié et père de 15 enfants, il est établi dans le village de thilène, il a commencé à exercer cette activité depuis qu'il est petit, avec ce crédit, il va acheter du semence de tomate, d'onions, d'herbicide et d'engrais.
texts.en: Issakh is a farmer in the village of Thilene. He is 58 years old, married, and has 15 children. He started market gardening with his parents when he was little. With this loan, he will buy onion seeds, local eggplant, herbicide, and fertilizer.

loans.use: buy onion seeds, local eggplant, herbicide, and fertilizer.

loans.name: Ntizoguta Group

texts.fr:
Aline fait partie du groupe Ntizoguta et habite à  Gitega. Elle a 35 ans et est mariée à Ernest, un photographe-cameraman. Ensemble ils ont 2 enfants  l’un a 3 ans et l’autre 12 ans, tous étudient.

Elle fait le commerce de boutique (unités téléphoniques, riz, haricot, ...) depuis 11 ans.

Elle est à son neuvième crédit avec Turame. Avec le crédit Kiva qu’elle  obtient, elle va augmenter son capital et acheter  beaucoup d’articles de sa boutique (unités téléphoniques, riz, haricot,…) à revendre pour gagner plus.

Dans les prochaines années, elle voudrait acheter une grande propriété foncière pour une agriculture moderne et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Aline belongs to group Ntizoguta and lives in Gitega. She is 35 years old and married to Ernest, a photographer and cameraman. They have two children together: one is three and the other is twelve. Both attend school.
She has been in retail (phone credits, rice, beans…) for eleven years.
She is on her ninth loan with Turame. With her Kiva loan, she is going to increase her capital to buy many more items to resell in her shop (phone credits, rice, beans…), in order to earn more.

loans.use: to increase her capital and buy many items to resell in her store (phone credits, rice, beans...) in order to earn more.

loans.name: Wendi Elizabeth

texts.es: Wendi de 21 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a su pequeño hijo de tres años de edad. Ella se dedica al comercio de tienda la cual con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer. Desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la introducción de la energía eléctrica y para comprar y  lámina galvanizada y madera para reparar el techo de la vivienda el cual se encuentra deteriorado.
texts.en:
Wendi, 21, is a single mother.  She lives in her own house with her young three-year-old.  She makes a living as a merchant in a store she set up with a lot of effort.

Wendi wants to improve the condition of her house.  She's asking FUSAI for a loan to invest in electricty and to buy galvanized metal and wood to repair her roof, which is deteriorated.

loans.use: to install electricity and to repair her roof

loans.name: Vitelio

texts.es: Vitelio de 40 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus hijos desde hace 13 años. Vitelio es un hombre trabajador quien se dedica a la prestación de servicios de seguridad en una fábrica cercana a su localidad. Con el objetivo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida desea construir un cuarto dormitorio para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro y lámina galvanizada.
texts.en:
Vitelio, who is forty years old, has been living in the home he owns with his wife and their children for thirteen years. Vitelio is a hard worker. He works providing security services for a factory near the town where he lives. 

In order to improve his living conditions, he wants to build another bedroom in his home. That is why he is requesting this loan from FUSAI, so that he can invest in purchasing bricks, cement, sand, iron, and sheet metal.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, iron, and sheet metal for building a bedroom.

loans.name: Nolvi Evedit

texts.es: Nolvi de 43 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su y sus dos hijos. Ella se dedica a la venta de antojitos típicos como pastelitos de carne, yuca frita, enchiladas, etc. Tiene 8 años de dedicarse al negocio  por lo que ya cuenta con muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más. Nolvi desea construir un pequeño cuarto dormitorio por lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro, puertas, ventanas y lámina galvanizada. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento ya que no cuenta con los recursos económicos para hacerlo por su cuenta.
texts.en:
Nolvi, who is 43 years old, lives in the home she owns with her husband and their two children. She works selling traditional food items like meat pies, fried yuca, enchiladas, etc. She has been in this business for eight years, so she already has many customers who prefer her more and more each day. 

Nolvi wants to build a small bedroom, which is why she is requesting this loan from FUSAI. It will allow her to invest in purchasing bricks, cement, sand, iron, doors, windows, and corrugated sheet metal. She needs this financing because she doesn't have the financial resources to carry out the project on her own.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, iron, doors, windows, and sheet metal to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Alba Elizabeth

texts.es: Alba de 39 años de edad vive en casa alquilada con su hija y su esposo que trabaja como motorista, ella posee un chalet cerca de su lugar de residencia donde vende golosinas, dulces, refrescos, gaseosas, jugos, etc. desde hace 2 años, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Alba esta solicitando un credito para comprar mas mercadería por mayor y asi poder surtir su negocio que le genera buenas ganancias y poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Alba, who is 39 years old, lives in the home she rents with her husband and daughter. Her husband works as a driver and she has a food stand near their home, where she sells snacks, sweets, soft drinks, sodas, juice, etc. She has been in business for two years and the profit she makes from her sales, along with her husband's help, allows them to cover some of their household expenses.

Alba is requesting a loan in order to purchase more wholesale merchandise so that she can have her business well stocked and it generates good profits, which in turn will allow her to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale snacks, sweets, soft drinks, sodas, juice, etc.

loans.name: Sallay

texts.en:
Meet 40-year-old Sallay from Magburaka, Nothern area in Sierra Leone. She is married with 4 children. 

In 1986, Sallay established her local food business. She began her business because she wants to improve her standard of living. She works at the business from 8:00am until 5:30 pm, 6 days per week. She says that the main challenge to her business is inflation and insufficient funds to expand her business.

Sallay requires a loan to purchase more palm oil, rice and seasonings to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to improve her standard of living and increase her business. She usually cover the Localfood with plastic container. 

In the future, Sallay plans to expand her business. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more palm oil, rice and seasonings to expand her business.

loans.name: Che Isobel

texts.en:
Che Isobel is a widow with six children. They live in a seven bedroom apartment in the Bamenda Mezam Division of the North West Region of Cameroon. She has faced many challenges in life, among which are inadequate capital to successfully carry out her business, sickness in her family, death of close family members, and inadequate finances to educate her children.

She has taken and repaid her loans successfully three times and says with the new loan requested, she will expand her firewood business by buying more wood, and buy maize, drinks for her bar and palm wine. She holds a positive view of her business succeeding because she has been doing it; she has ready customers who buy from her; and she supplies drinks in ceremonial activities like birthdays, marriages, and death celebrations. With this activity the community will have a regular supply at their door steps and at cheaper prices.

With the profit from this business, she will expand her business by reinvesting, cater to her children's needs, and use it for other unforeseen situations. She prefers GHAPE loans because of the low interest rate and convenient repayment intervals.

loans.use: To buy firewood, maize, drinks, and palm wine.

loans.name: Douglas Ernesto

texts.es: Douglas de 36 años de edad reside en casa propia junto a sus hijos. Él se dedica a  la prestación de servicios de una empresa de banquetes, de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de las paredes de la vivienda y el techo de la misma ya que se encuentran deterioradas y no es muy seguro. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena, estructuras metálicas para enrejar, ladrillo y lámina galvanizada.
texts.en:
Douglas, who is 36 years old, lives with his children in the home he owns. He works providing services for a banqueting company, which is how he makes a living and provides for his family. 

In order to improve his living conditions, he is requesting this loan from FUSAI so that he can invest in rebuilding the walls and roof of his house, which are in disrepair and not very safe. He will use the requested amount to buy cement, sand, wrought iron, bricks, and sheet metal.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, wrought iron, bricks, and sheet metal to repair the roof and walls of his home.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: julio de 57 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus hijos el se dedica a la agricultura y albañilería desde hace 7 años, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el desea mejorar su vivienda y terminar de construir unos cuartos para que sus hijos puedan dormir mas cómodos, pero con lo que gana no le alcanza para poder realizarlo por esa razón solicita un crédito a INTEGRAL para poder comprar los materiales necesarios como: arena, ladrillos, cemento, hierro, pintura, etc. para poder terminar de construir dichos cuartos y así todos puedan vivir cómodos y seguros.
texts.en: Julio, who is 57 years old, lives with his partner and their children in a house he owns. He has worked in construction and farming for seven years. With what he makes from his sales he is able to cover some of his household expenses. He wants to improve his home and finish building some rooms so that his children can sleep more comfortably, but what he is earning is not enough to be able to carry this out. That is why he is requesting a loan from Integral, so that he can buy the material he needs, like sand, bricks, cement, iron, paint, etc. This will allow him to finish building the rooms so that they can all live comfortably and safely.

loans.use: to buy sand, bricks, cement, iron, paint, etc.

loans.name: Irma Esperanza

texts.es: Irma de 41 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, el mayor de ellos le ayuda económicamente. Ella posee una venta de ropa tiene de diferentes estilos y  para todas las personas damas, caballeros, niños y niñas, la ropa que comercia es de muy buena calidad y la vende a precios accesibles es por eso que se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente; Irma es muy activa siempre se encuentra trabajando luchando por salir adelante. Para ella el propósito y coraje que le pone a su labor tiene una dirección ver crecer el negocio para lograr un mejor futuro, es por eso que se decidió solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa en variedad como faldas, pantalones, blusas, camisetas, trajes etc. Así siempre podrá satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. ella tiene la esperanza que de esta forma lograra darle a su familia seguridad económica y una vida plena.
texts.en:
Irma, who is 41 years old, is a single mother of three children, the oldest of which helps her out financially. She works selling different styles of clothing for everyone: men, women, boys, and girls. The clothing she sells is very good quality and she sells it at affordable prices, which is why she has attracted a lot of customers lately. 

Irma is very active and is always working and fighting to get ahead. She puts purpose and passion into her work in order to see her business grow so that she can achieve a better future. That is why she decided to request a loan from Integral, which will allow her to purchase a variety of clothing items like skirts, pants, blouses, t-shirts, suits, etc.  This will enable her to meet all her customers' needs. She is hopeful that this way she will manage to give her family financial security and a full life.

loans.use: to buy skirts, pants, blouses, t-shirts, suits, etc.

loans.name: Sinna

texts.en:
Sinna is 29 years old and married with three children. She runs a retail business in Magburaka, the northern area of Sierra Leone. She started her business to take care of her needs.

She has been in this business since 2006 and sells Ovaltine, pop drinks, cigarettes and biscuits within her community. Her business is the only source of income she has. She says that her major problem to her business is price inflation.

Sinna requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to purchase more stock to expand her business. She says that the extra income from this loan will help her to take care of her parents and increase her business. In the future, she would like to open a big provision store in the community.

loans.use: to purchase more Ovaltine, pop drinks, milk, cigarettes and biscuits to expand her business.

loans.name: Jose Armando

texts.es: José de 34 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus cuatro hijas de 17 años, 14 años, 20 años y 2 años de edad. José se dedica a la venta de mariscos de forma ambulante desde hace 18 años. Trabaja muy duro para llevar el sustento a sus hijos y mantener la economía del hogar. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y grava para encementar el piso de la vivienda.
texts.en:
José is 34 years old and lives in his own house with his life partner and their four daughters aged 17, 14, 20 and 2.  For the last 18 years José has made a living as a street trader selling shellfish. He works very hard to provide for his children and support the household finances. 

José is asking FUSAI for this loan to buy cement, sand and gravel in order to put down a concrete floor in his home.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and gravel to put down a concrete floor in his home.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Luis de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus cinco hijos, el posee un taller de estructuras metálicas ubicado en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela porque su trabajo es de calidad y a buen precio, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gatos de su hogar, el desea mejorar su vivienda colocando el techo y terminar de construir unos cuartos para sus hijos, pero con lo que obtiene de su trabajo no le alcanza para poder realizar dicho trabajo por esa razon solicita un credito para la compra de los materiales  necesarios como: cemento, ladrillos, duralitas, pintura, hierro, erena, etc. y asi poder vivir junto con su familia mas cómodos y seguros.
texts.en:
Luis is 47 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and their five children. He has a metal workshop in his home and has a lot of customers since his work is of a high quality and a good price. He is able to cover some of the household costs with what he earns. 

Luis wants to improve his home by fixing the roof and finishing the construction of some rooms for his children, but he does not earn enough from his work to be able to cover the cost of this work. This is why he is asking for a loan to buy the necessary materials such as cement, bricks, fibre roofing sheets, paint, iron, sand etc. so he and his family can all live comfortably and securely together.

loans.use: to buy materials such as cement, bricks, fibre roofing sheets, paint, iron, sand etc.

loans.name: Sonia Isabel

texts.es: Sonia de 37 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos de 18 años y 15 años de edad. Sonia se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos y habita en condiciones muy humildes junto a su grupo familiar. Sonia  solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera, arena, cemento, arena y grava para mejorar las paredes de la cocina y para encementar el piso de la vivienda el cual actualmente es de tierra.
texts.en:
Sonia is 37 years old and lives in her own house with her life partner and their two children aged 18 and 15. Sonia works as a domestic help and lives in very basic conditions with her family group.

Sonia is asking for this loan from FUSAI to buy galvanised laminated sheets, wood, sand, cement and gravel to repair the kitchen walls and to put down a concrete floor in the house, which currently has an earth floor.

loans.use: to buy galvanised laminated sheets, wood, sand, cement and gravel to repair the kitchen walls and to put down a concrete floor in the house.

loans.name: Humberto Nehemias

texts.es: Humberto vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo de 1 año de edad en casa propia ; el posee una venta de chocobananos y pinchos helados de diferentes frutas, tiene varios años de dedicarse al negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas, comercia de forma ambulante en un carretón y posee mucha clientela ya que es un producto muy vendible, Humberto quiere hacer crecer su negocio pero no posee de suficiente capital para invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar banano, frutas, chocolate etc. Humberto tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda, y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Humberto lives with his life partner and their one-year-old son in their own house. He has a business selling “chocobananos” [frozen chocolate-covered bananas] and frozen skewers of various fruits. He has been in this business for several years and this has given him sales experience. He sells on the streets from a small cart and has a lot of customers as it is a very marketable product.

Humberto wants to make his business grow but he does not have sufficient capital to invest in supplies so he is asking INTEGRAL for a loan which will enable him to buy bananas, fruit, chocolate etc. Humberto has good payment references and is very responsible. He gives assurances that he will be able to pay off the loan, while at the same time giving his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy bananas, fruit, chocolate etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy trousers for men and women, shirts, blouses, Lycra clothing, cosmetics, handbags, shoes etc., all wholesale.

loans.name: Vicenta De Jesus

texts.es: Vicenta de 32 años de edad vive en casa de un familiar ella se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de productos de uso personal como lociones, desodorantes, perfumes, cremas, etc. su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar los gastos de su hogar vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus hijos, la clienta desea acrecentar su negocio por eso solicta un crédito que le permita poder comprar todo lo necesario como: perfumes, desodorantes, lociones, cremas, etc. ya que tiene mucha clientela por dar sus productos a precios accesibles con la ayuda solictada ella podra obtener mejores ganancias y asi seguira dandole a su familia lo que necesita sin limitacion alguna
texts.en:
Vicenta is 32 years old and lives in a house belonging to a relative. She makes a living selling all kinds of personal care products such as lotions, deodorants, perfumes, creams etc. She has her business in her home and with the profits she makes from her sales and the help of her husband they manage to cover the household expenses. She lives in her own house with her husband and their children. 

Vicenta wants to increase her business and so she is asking for a loan which will enable her to buy everything she needs such as perfumes, deodorants, lotions, creams etc. She has a lot of customers as she sells her products at affordable prices. With the help she is asking for, she will be able to obtain better profits and continue to provide everything her family needs without any restrictions.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, deodorants, lotions, creams etc.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María de 52 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y su pequeño nieto de 2 años de edad. María se dedica al comercio de tienda la cual ha logrado establecer en su hogar de habitación y de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Es muy trabajadora y responsable por lo que sus vecinos dan muy buenas referencias. María desea invertir en su tienda con el fin de satisfacer una mayor demanda y así poder mejorar sus ventas y sus ingresos. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mercadería como: huevos, aceite, cereales, golosinas, detergente, papel higiénico, etc.
texts.en: María, 52, lives in her own house with her common-law husband and a two-year-old grandson.  She runs a store out of her home in order to earn a living to support the household.  She is a hard worker and very responsible so her neighbors giver her very good references.  María wants to invest in her store so she can meet the growing demand and increase her sales and income.  To do so, she is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy goods such as eggs, oil, cereals, sweets, detergent, toilet paper, etc.

loans.use: To buy eggs, oil, cereals, sweets, detergent, toilet paper, etc.

loans.name: Marcos Antonio

texts.es: Marcos de 41 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa quien se dedica a los oficios domésticos de su casa. Marcos es un hombre trabajador quien se gana la vida por medio de la venta de leche de forma ambulante. Con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado comprar ganado en especial vacas para ganarse la vida de esta forma. Tiene 10 años de de trabajar como ganadero y dedicarse a la venta de leche por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia. Desea invertir en la compra de nuevos terneros por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para hacer la compra de los animales y así hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en: Marcos, 41, lives in his own house with his wife who is a homemaker.  Marcos is a hard worker who earns a living as a street vendor selling milk.  Through much effort he was able to buy the livestock, especially cows, he now has.  He has been working as a livestock farmer and selling milk for ten years, so he has considerable experience.  In order to buy new calves he is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy livestock and grow his business.

loans.use: To buy cattle.

loans.name: Ana Nohemy

texts.es: Ana de 39 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija, ella se dedica a la venta de dulces típicos como: de coco, de tamarindo, de leche, de nances, maní dulce y salado, etc. desde hace varios años, comercializa de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Ana esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas dulces por mayor para seguir con su trabajo y así obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ana, 39, lives in her own house with her husband and daughter.  For several years, she has been selling typical sweets such as coconut, tamarind, caramel, nance, sweet and salty peanuts, etc.  She works as a street vendor in different communities near her place of residence.  The income she earns is to help her husband cover household expenses.  Ana is requesting a loan to buy more sweets, wholesale, to continue her business and make more profit so her family can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy sweets, wholesale.

loans.name: Reyes De Los Santos

texts.es: Reyes de 54 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus hijos. Reyes es una mujer trabajadora quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para llevar el sustento a su hogar. Ella se gana la vida por medio de la venta de pupusas (preparación alimenticia a base de masa de maíz, queso y frijoles.) las cuales son muy demandadas por sus clientes. Desea invertir en su negocio de pupusas por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de materiales como: maíz, queso, frijoles, tomates, repollo, etc. para preparar las deliciosas pupusas.
texts.en: Reyes, 54, lives in her own house with her children.  She is a hard worker who does everything she can to provide for her household.  Reyes earns a living selling "pupusas" (tortillas stuffed with cheese and beans) which are very popular among her customers.  She wants to invest in her business and is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy ingredients such as corn, cheese, beans, tomatoes, cabbage, etc. to make her delicious pupusas.

loans.use: To buy corn, cheese, beans, tomatoes, cabbage, etc.

loans.name: Aminta Noemy

texts.es: Aminta de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia su esposo y sus hijos, es muy conocida en la zona donde reside por su humildad y su entrega al trabajo, nunca se ha dejado vencer y siempre ha salido adelante con sus dificultades. Con esfuerzo y dedicación posee una tienda en la que vende productos de primera necesidad granos básicos, leche, huevos, arroz, golosinas, pan, entre otros, es muy dedicada a su labor y muy servicial a la hora de vender, es por eso que posee clientes que la buscan y la prefieren por sus productos. Se ha visto en la necesidad de surtir un poco mas la tienda debido al aumento de demanda y pero no tiene el capital para realizarlo, es por eso que la clienta solicita un crédito para comprar más productos como granos básicos, producto instantáneo, golosinas, bebidas, etc. Confía en Dios de que pronto la ayuda solicitada, será otorgada, y no tendrá más preocupación que llevar el sustento diario a su hogar.
texts.en:
Aminta, 37, lives in her own house with her husband and children.  She is very well known in the area for her humbleness and dedication to work, never giving up and always overcoming her difficulties.  With effort and dedication she runs a store where she sells essential items such as basic grains, milk, eggs, rice, sweets, bread, etc.  She works hard and provides good customer service, so they prefer shopping at her store.  

Because of the increase in demand she needs to stock more products at her store but does not have the capital to do so.  So she is requesting a loan to buy more goods such as basic grains, instant products, sweets, beverages, etc.  She has faith that she will receive the loan soon and not have to worry about being able to provide for her family.

loans.use: To buy basic grains, instant products, sweets, beverages, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy packs of clothing, cosmetics, etc.

loans.name: Maria  Alicia

texts.es: Doña Maria vive en casa propia junto con su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta de joyería de enchape lo hace de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por que su producto es de buena calidad y a precios accesibles, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Doña Maria esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería como: anillos, cadenas, pulseras, aritos, etc. todo de enchape por mayor ya que esa es su unica fuente d trabajo y asi tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su esposo.
texts.en: María lives in a house that she owns alongside her husband. She works selling gold-plated jewellery and a street vendor in the different areas near her home. María has many customers because her products are good quality and sold at affordable prices. With her profits, María is able to cover some household costs. María is applying for a new loan in order to buy more merchandise. She will buy gold-plated rings, chains, bracelets and more in bulk. This is her only job and this loan will help María to enjoy a better quality of life with her husband.

loans.use: to buy gold-plated rings, chains, bracelets and more in bulk.

loans.name: Ana Rubia

texts.es: Ana de 26 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo de cuatro años de edad. Ana se dedica al cultivo y venta de hortalizas desde hace tres años. Cultiva principalmente chiles, pipianes, pepinos, etc. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Desea invertir en el cultivo de las hortalizas para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de semillas y abonos para el negocio.
texts.en: Ana is 26 years old and lives in her own house with her partner and four-year-old son. Ana has been making a living growing and selling vegetables for three years. She grows mainly chillis, cucumbers, and other items. With this work Ana earns a living and supports her household. Ana wants to invest in her vegetable crops and so is applying for a loan from FUSAI in order to buy seeds and manure for her business.

loans.use: to buy seeds and manure for growing vegetables.

loans.name: Ana Guadalupe

texts.es: Ana de 36 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus hijos. Ana posee una pequeña tienda en su hogar de residencia, además, hace y vende pupusas (preparación alimenticia a base de masa de maíz, frijoles, queso, etc.). Es una mujer emprendedora quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para dar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mayor inventario para la tienda como: cereales, aceite, golosinas, detergente, etc. y para invertir en la compra de los insumos necesarios para la elaboración de las ricas pupusas.
texts.en: Ana is 36 years old and lives in her own house with her children. Ana has a small shop in her home and also sells "pupusas" (a corn-tortilla stuffed with beans, cheese and other foods). Ana is an enterprising woman who does everything that she can in order to give her family a better life. Ana is applying for this loan in order to invest in more stock for her store. She will buy cereals, oil, sweets, detergent and more for the store, and will invest in the necessary supplies for making her delicious "pupusas".

loans.use: to buy cereals, oil, sweets, detergent, tomatoes, cheese, cabbage and more.

loans.name: Ana Silvia

texts.es: Ana 38 años de edad vive junto a su hija, ella es una mujer muy responsable quien siempre está en miras de mejorar su estabilidad económica. Ella trabaja en su propia panadería en la que elabora pan francés, el cual elabora ella sola a primeras horas de la madrugada para poder venderlo antes del desayuno, que es cuando las personas más lo consumen al igual que en la cena. Ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para contar con la ayuda necesaria para invertir en la compra de harina, levadura, manteca, latas y todo lo necesario para poder producir más. Este proyecto de mejoramiento para su panadería es muy importante para ella puesto que así mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Ana is 38 years old and lives with her daughter. Ana is a very responsible woman and is always looking out for ways to improve her financial stability. She works in her own bread shop, where she makes rolls. She works on her own from very early in the morning, in order to sell her product before breakfast, the time, along with dinner, when people most consume her products. Ana is applying for a loan from INTEGRAL in order to have the necessary help to invest in flour, yeast, butter, dough and other items necessary to produce more bread. This project to improve her bread shop is very important for Ana as it will allow her to improve her family's and her own quality of life.

loans.use: to buy flour, yeast, butter, dough and more.

loans.name: Oscar Eliseo

texts.es: Oscar de 29 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su madre y hermanos. Oscar se gama la vida trabajando como empleado en una institución cercana de su localidad. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Oscar posee un pequeño taller de mecánica en su hogar de residencia el cual desea mejorar la galera donde lo tiene ya que se encuentra en mal estado. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir ne la compra de ladrillo, arena, cemento y lámina galvanizada.
texts.en: Oscar is 29 years old and lives in his privately owned house with his mother and siblings. Oscar earns a living working for a local institution. He earns a wage there and is able to support his household. Oscar also has a small mechanic's workshop in his home. He wants to renovate the workshop as it is currently in a bad condition. In order to carry out this renovation work, Oscar is applying for a loan from FUSAI in order to buy bricks, sand, cement and galvanized metal sheeting.

loans.use: to buy bricks, sand, cement, galvanized metal sheeting to repair his workshop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy material, threads, needles and more.

loans.name: Erick Edgardo

texts.es: Erick de 32 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su madre e hijo de ocho años de edad. Erick trabaja como motorista en transporte privado en su localidad. Es un hombre muy trabajador y responsable quien desea dar mejores condicione a su familia. Desea construir un muro de retención en su terreno para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro y así poder proceder a la construcción del muro lo antes posible.
texts.en: Erick, 32, lives in his own home with his mother and his eight-year-old son. Erick works as a private taxi driver locally. He is a hardworking and responsible man who wants to give his family better living conditions. He wants to build a retaining wall on his property. He has requested a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of brick, cement, sand, and iron so he can proceed with the construction of the wall as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase brick, cement, sand, and iron to construct a retaining wall.

loans.name: Carmen Lisseth

texts.es: Carmen de 29 años de edad habita en casa familiar junto a sus padres y hermano. Carmen trabaja como empleada en una institución cercana a su localidad por lo que mensualmente percibe un salario que le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para reparar la vivienda ya que con el tiempo el techo y los pilares se han dañado. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada, madera, clavos y pilares ademas pagará la mano de obra para las reparaciones.
texts.en: Carmen, 29, lives in her family's home with her parents and brother. Carmen works as a clerk in a company near to her home where she receives a monthly salary that allows her to support the household. She is applying for this loan from FUSAI to repair their home because the roof and pillars have been damaged over time. With the amount requested, she will buy galvanized steel, wood, nails, and pillars, and pay for laborers to make the repairs.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized steel, wood, nails, and pillars to repair her home.

loans.name: Noemi Marineli

texts.es: Noemí de 42 años de edad, vive con su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos, Noemí trabaja confeccionando todo tipo de ropa tiene mucha clientela que la prefieren porque confecciona sus prendas a buen precio. Ella es muy responsable y siempre entregan los pedidos a tiempo, lo que le ha ayudado a contar con muy buenas referencias y clientes. Noemí trabaja muy duro para sostener su hogar, y desea mejorar su negocio contando con mayor materia prima para elaborar más prendas de vestir. Es por esta razón que ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL y de este modo contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en su negocio comprando agujas, hilos, tela,etc. y asi obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Noemí, 42, lives with her partner and their three children. Noemí works manufacturing all kinds of clothes. She has many customers who prefer to buy from her because she makes garments at a good price. She is very responsible and always delivers her orders on time, which has helped her to have very good recommendations and customers. Noemí works hard to maintain her home. She wants to improve her business by having increased raw material to make clothing. For this reason, she is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral to have the capital to invest in her business for buying needles, thread, fabric, and more to obtain better profits and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase needles, threads, fabric, and more to make clothing.

loans.name: Zeneida Maribel

texts.es: Zeneida de 46 años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo es de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden y al gusto de los clientes; quiere realizar una nueva inversión, pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor. Zeneida asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: Zeneida, 46, lives with her partner and their two children in their own home. She has been selling clothes for several years which has given her plenty of experience which allows her to earn more profits. The business is located in her home. She has done well with this business because people know that everything is of good quality at affordable prices with unsurpassed customer service. She wanted to make a new investment but did not have sufficient capital to support it so she requested a loan from Apoyo Integral that will allow her to buy wholesale clothing. Zeneida ensures that she will pay off her debt and provide for her household's economic security.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale clothing.

loans.name: Ruben Antonio

texts.es: Ruben de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar conformado por su esposa y sus hijos, el se dedica a la carpintería elabora todo tipo de muebles y ataudes desde hace varios años, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, Ruben esta solicitando un credito para la compra de madera, clavos, barniz y otras herramientas que el utiliza, para seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su unica fuente de ingresos y asi poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad e vida.
texts.en: Ruben, 45, lives in his own home with his familial group which consists of his wife and children. He earns his living in woodworking. He has made all kinds of furniture and caskets for several years. What he earns at work is used to solve the economic problems in their home. Ruben is requesting a loan to purchase wood, nails, varnish, and other tools that he uses to continue his work. It is his family's only source of income to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase wood, nails, varnish, and other tools.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es: Teresa vive en casa propia con sus hijos y su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de articulos de primera necesidad como: granos básicos, huevos,jugos gaseosas, papel higiénico, detergentes, jabón, etc. su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia desde hace vario años posee mucha clientela porque siempre tiene lo que buscan, con las ganancias que obtiene y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar algunos gastos del hogar, Teresa esta solicitando un crédito para a compra de mas mercadería por mayor para poder seguir con su negocio que es su única fuente de trabajo y así poderle dar a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Teresa lives in her own home with her children and her husband. She sells all kinds of staple items such as grains, eggs, soda, juice, toilet paper, detergent, and soap. Her business is located in her home and was established several years ago. She has a lot of customers because she always has what they want. The income she earns is used to cover household expenses which she shares with her husband. Teresa is requesting a loan to buy wholesale merchandise to continue with her business as it is her only source of work. She would like to give her family what they need without any limitations.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale items for her shop.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: julio vive en casa propia con su familia conformada por sus dos hijos y su esposa, el posee una tienda en su lugar de residencia tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, es muy reconocido por los vecinos de la zona, se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda surtida, el quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar lo necesario para su tienda como golosinas, granos basicos, aceite, arroz, azucar, refrescos, etc. asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en:
Julio lives in his own house with his family which is composed of two children and his wife. He has a store in his home. He has years of experience in this business so he knows the products that yield the greatest profits. He is well-known by his neighbors in the area. He has made a lot of clients as his store is well-stocked. 

Julio wants to expand his business and make another investment but he doesn't have enough capital. So he is requesting a loan which will allow him to buy what his store needs like candy, basic grains, oil, rice, sugar, soft drinks, etc. He assures us that he will pay off his loan and at the same time is confident that he can provide his family with a higher quality of living.

loans.use: to buy candy, basic grains, oil, rice, sugar, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Yessica Cecilia

texts.es: Yessica de 21 años de edad, es una joven muy trabajadora que desde hace dos años se dedica a la venta de frutas en el mercado de su localidad. Ella desea ayudar a su familia y mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda; por lo que ha solicitado a FUSAI un crédito para comprar bloque de concreto, cemento, arena, grava y otros materiales para la construcción de paredes de una nueva habitación. Ella espera saldar su deuda y seguir siendo sujeta de créditos y lograr hacer otras mejoras futuras a su vivienda.
texts.en: Yessica is 21 years old. She is a hard-working young woman who for the past two years has been selling fruit in the local market.She wants to help her family and improve their living conditions. So she has requested a loan from FUSAI to buy cement blocks, cement, sand, gravel and other materials to build the walls of a new room. She expects to pay off her loan and continue taking loans in the future, to make other improvements to her home.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to build another room on her house.

loans.name: Maria Cleofes

texts.es: María de 27 años de edad tiene tres hijos menores de edad y vive junto a su compañero de vida en casa propia. María y su esposo están haciendo todo el esfuerzo posible para que sus hijos tengan un ambiente mejor a la de ellos por lo que desde hace años vienen construyendo su casa; es por ello que María ha solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para ampliar su vivienda y construir el espacio de cocina. Con el dinero compraría los bloques de concreto, arena, grava, hierro y otros materiales necesarios para dicha construcción.
texts.en: María is 27 years old and has three minor children. She lives with her life companion in their own home.  María and her husband are making every effort so that the children have a better environment that what they had. They have been building their house for years. So  María has requested a loan from FUSAI to expand their house by building a kitchen space. She will buy concrete blocks, sand, gravel, re-bar and other materials needed for this construction.

loans.use: to buy concrete blocks, sand, gravel, re-bar and other materials for building their kitchen.

loans.name: Blanca Alicia

texts.es: Blanca de 37 años de edad se dedica a la venta de ropa interior para damas y caballeros, desde hace 6 años ejerce este oficio y cuenta con muchos clientes fijos con lo que puede mantener su negocio a flote, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logar cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, ella vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos,  Blanca solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de ropa interior ya que posee gran demanda por parte de muchas personas, con lo que podrá adquirir en diferentes precios, estilos y colores y de esta forma contar con más clientes y así mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Blanca is 37 years old and she sells man's and woman's underwear. She has been doing this business for 6 years and she has many steady clients who keep her business afloat. With what she makes from her sales she manages to pay some of the household expenses. She lives with her husband and her three children. Blanca is requesting a loan which which to buy a greater quantity of underwear. She has a lot of orders from customers. She can buy different price ranges, styles, colors and in this way gain more clients and thus improve the quality of living of her family.

loans.use: to buy man's and woman's underwear.

loans.name: Mariano

texts.es: Mariano de 65 años de edad vive solo en casa propia, que con su propio esfuerzo fue construyendo. Mariano es empleado y comerciante de flores. Mariano se acercó a FUSAI para solicitar un crédito ya que necesita reparar el techo de su vivienda. Con el dinero comprará la lámina galvanizada, madera para la estructura del techo y pagará la mano de obra. Él es una persona muy conocida y todas las personas dan muy buena referencia.
texts.en: Mariano is 65 years old. He lives alone in his own home which he built by himself. Mariano is an employee and a seller of flowers. Mariano has come to FUSAI to request a loan as he needs to repair the roof of his house. He will buy galvanized sheeting, wood for the structure if the roof and pay for labor with the money. He is a well-known person and everyone would give him a good reference.

loans.use: to buy laminated sheeting, nails, wood and pay for labor to repair the roof of his house.

loans.name: Omar Antonio

texts.es: Omar es un joven de 25 años de edad quien está acompañado y tienen un hijo.  Su esposa colabora con él en el quehacer del hogar y cuido de su hijo, Omar trabaja como empleado de una empresa embotelladoras de agua desde hace dos años y con su salario a podido mantener a su familia. Omar desea levantar unas paredes de su vivienda y hacer un cuarto más a su vivienda. Por esa razón a solicitado un crédito a FUSAI y comprar cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo de barrio y otros necesarios para la construcción del cuarto de habitación.
texts.en:
Omar is a 25 year old young man.  He is in a relationship, and they have a son.  His wife helps him with the household tasks and in taking care of their son.  Omar has worked as an employee of a water bottling company for two years.  He has been able to support his family with his salary.

Omar wishes to raise some walls to his house and to make another room in his house.  That is the reason that he has requested a loan from FUSAI.  He will use the loan to buy cement, sand, gravel, bricks, and other necessities in order to build a room in his house.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, bricks and other necessities in order to build a room in his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy flour, shortening, tins, and everything he needs in order to produce more.

loans.name: Xiomara Elizabeth

texts.es: Xiomara vive en casa porpia con su madre, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa interior para damas y caballeros dedes hace varios años su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela fija que la buscan por que sus productos son de calidad y a buenos precios, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logar cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, ella solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de ropa interior con lo que podrá adquirir en diferentes precios, estilos y colores y de esta forma contar con más clientes y así mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su madre.
texts.en:
Xiomara lives in her own house with her mother.  Xiomara has been selling women’s and men’s underwear for several years.  Her business is located at the market that is close to where she lives.  She has a lot of customers.  They seek her out because her products are quality, and she has good prices.  With the income that she gets from her sales, she manages to cover some of the household expenses.

She is requesting a loan with which she will be able to buy a greater quantity of underwear.  She will get different prices, styles, and colors.  This way she will have more customers, and she will improve her quality of life and that of her mother.

loans.use: to buy women's and men's underwear.

loans.name: Junior Antonio

texts.es: Junior, tiene 21 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposa con quien tiene una hija y vive en el municipio de Tela,Atlantida. El se dedica a la reparación y venta de accesorios para celulares. Este negocio lo tiene hace 2 años ubicado en el mercado local. Anteriormente se dedicaba a vender ropa en una tienda. El préstamo que ha solicitado es por 8,000 Lempiras y lo invertirá en la compra de una vitrina y accesorios para celulares. Esta inversion le servira para exhibir los celulares y productos que vende y mejorar el servicio a sus clientes. Tiene como meta, agrandar su negocio y con las ganancias poder comprar su casa y ayudar a su hija con el estudio.
texts.en:
Junior, age 21, lives with his common-law wife.  They have a daughter, and they live in the Tela municipality in Atlantida.  He sells accessories and repairs cell phones.  He has had the business for two years, and it is located at the local market.  He previously sold clothes at a store.

He has requested a loan for 8,000 lempiras.  He will use the loan to buy a display case and cell phone accessories.  With this investment he will display the cell phones and the products that he sells.  He will also improve his customer service.  His goal is to expand his business.  His goal is to use the profits to be able to buy a house and help with his daughter’s education.

loans.use: to buy a display case and cell phone accessories.

loans.name: Norma Yaneth

texts.es: Norma ella posee un vivero en su lugar de residencia vende todo tipo de plantas desde hace varios años y posee clientela ya establecida que la buscan por los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logra salir adelante con los gastos que se les presentan en su hogar, vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos y su esposo, Norma esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de hierro y alambre para elaborar canastas para poner las plantas así como las muestra en la fotografía y seguir con su negocio que le genera buenas ganancias para darle a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Norma has had a nursery at her house for several years.  She sells all types of plants, and she has an established clientele who seek her out for the good prices.  With what she gets from her sales, and with her husband’s help, she manages to get ahead with the household expenses.  She lives in her own house with her two children and her husband.  

Norma is requesting a loan to buy iron and wire in order to make baskets in which to put the plants.  In this way, as seen in the photograph, she will continue with her business that generates good profits for her.  She does this in order to give her family what they need without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy iron and wire.

loans.name: Betty Elizabeth

texts.es: Betty, tiene 39 años de edad, es casada, tiene 4 hijos y vive en el municipio de Choloma, Cortés. Ella Se dedica a la venta de mercadería como ropa nueva, usada, lociones, cremas y otros encargos. las ventas son realizadas de manera ambulante. Esta actividad es realizada desde hace 20 años de donde a podido mantener a su familia. El préstamo que solicita es por 7,500 lempiras y lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería y cubrir encargos como ser ropa, cremas, lociones y otros. Este préstamo le ayudara en un futuro lograr poner su propia tienda en una zona comercial. Como meta tiene darles una mejor educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Betty, age 39, is married and has four children.  She lives in the Choloma municipality in Cortés.  She sells merchandise like new and used clothes, lotions, creams, and other ordered items.  She makes her sales in an itinerant manner.  She has been engaged in this business activity for 20 years, and through it she has been able to support her family.

She is requesting a loan for 7,500 lempiras to buy merchandise and cover orders for things like clothes, creams, lotions, and others.  This loan will help her in the future to manage to set up her own store in a commercial area.  Her goal is to give her children a better education.

loans.use: to buy merchandise and cover orders for things like clothes, creams, lotions, and others.

loans.name: Sara Nohemy

texts.es: Sara, tiene 18 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo tiene una  hija  y vive en el municipio de Roatán. Se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas. Este negocio lo tiene en su casa. Desde muy pequeña aprendió con su madre y ahora lo administra ella. El préstamo es por 7,000 lempiras y lo invertirá en la compra de harina de maíz para elaborar tortillas. Como meta tiene seguir creciendo y mejorando, para generar empleo.
texts.en:
Sara, age 18, lives in a common-law marriage with her husband, and she has a daughter.  She lives in the Roatán municipality.  She makes and sells tortillas.  She has this business at her house.  When she was very little she learned with her mother, and she now runs the business.

The loan is for 7,000 lempiras, and she will use it to buy corn flour to make tortillas.  Her goal is to continue growing and improving in order to generate employment.

loans.use: to buy corn flour to make and sell tortillas.

loans.name: Fernando Jonathan

texts.es:
Fernando es un joven empleado de una pequeña empresa agroexportadora de naranjas, con los ingresos de su trabajo puede salir adelante.

Fernando está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda el podrá comprar un ropero, mueble para computadora, entre otros con lo cual podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y de esta manera vivir de manera más ordenada e higiénica, así el seguirá trabajando y luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Fernando is a young man who is employed by a small company that exports oranges.  With the income from his work he is able to get ahead.

Fernando is grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to their help, he will be able to buy a wardrobe [furniture for storing clothes], computer furniture, and others with which he will be able to improve his quality of life.  This way he will live in a tidier and more sanitary way.  This way he will continue working and struggling in order to be able to make his big dream a reality.  His dream is to have his own house.

loans.use: to buy a wardrobe [furniture for storing clothes], computer furniture, and others.

loans.name: Ubaldina Pascuala

texts.es:
Ubaldina vive en la ciudad de Nazca, trabja en su pequeño engocio de venta de golosinas y ropa de manera ambulante, lleva trabajando en su negocio alrededor de 2 años y con el fruto de su negocio puede solventar los gastos para sacar adelante a sus hijos a los cuales quiere muchísimo y por quienes lucha cada día a pesar de las adversidades.

Ubaldina agradece el apoyo que le están brindando los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a ello podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio como golosinas al por mayor (chocolates, chizitos, caramelos, entre otros) y mas ropa para poder ofrecer, sobre todo porque es temporada de verano, de esta manera ella podrá mejorar su negocio y podrá seguir luchando por hacer realidad su sueño:” Terminar de construir su vivienda”.
texts.en:
Ubaldina lives in the city of Nazca.  She works in her small business of selling candy and clothes in an itinerant manner.  She has been working in her business for around two years.  With the fruit of her business she is able to cover the expenses in order to get her children ahead.  She loves her children very much, and it is for them that she struggles every day in spite of the adversities.

Ubaldina is grateful for the support that the Kiva lenders are providing for her.  Thanks to this help, she will be able to buy merchandise for her business.  She will buy things like snacks wholesale (chocolates, cheese puffs, and candy, among others) and clothes, especially to sell in the summer season.  This way she will be able to improve her business.  She will be able to continue struggling to make her dream a reality.  Her dream is to finish building her house.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Anela Lina

texts.es:
Anela es una joven madre de 2 hijos a los cuales quiere muchísimo y por los que cada día se esfuerza para poder darles una vida digna. Anela para poder lograrlo tiene su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes, bebidas gaseosas, cerveza y venta de comida, se levanta muy temprano para atender su negocio y cree que le está yendo viene porque es amable con sus clientes.

Anela esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a este apoyo podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio, sobre todo abarrotes al por mayor, así podrá abastecer su negocio y atender a sus clientes de mejor manera, así seguirá trabajando y luchando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Implementar mas su negocio y darles una educación a sus hijos”.
texts.en:
Anela is a young mother with two children.  She loves them very much, and it is for them that she puts forth great effort every day in order to be able to give them a decent life.  In order to do so, Anela has a small business selling groceries, drinks, soft drinks, beer, and food.  She gets up very early to tend to her business.  She believes that it is going well for her because she is kind to her customers.

Anela is grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to this support, she will be able to buy merchandise for her business.  Most of all, she will buy groceries wholesale.  This way she will be able to stock her business and tend to her customers in a better manner.  This way she will continue working and struggling to make her big dream a reality.  Her dream is to implement her store more and to give her children an education.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Gina Esther

texts.es:
Gina tiene 30 años y vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, trabaja como secretaria en un colegio de su ciudad desde hace 1 año, con el fruto de su trabajo puede solventar los gastos de su hogar sobre todo porque es madre de familia.

Gina esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar materiales de construcción como clavos, listones, calamina, entre otros y poder solventar los gastos de mano de obre, con la finalidad de poder mejorar su vivienda ya que llueve mucho y su vivienda se inunda debido a las lluvias, así podrá seguir luchando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Comprar una casa de material noble”.
texts.en:
Gina, age 30, lives in the city of Pucallpa.  She has worked as a secretary at a school in her city for one year.  With the fruit of her work she is able to pay for the household expenses, which is most important because she is a mother.

Gina is grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to the help they have provided to her, she will be able to buy construction materials like nails, slats, and sheets of corrugated metal, among others.  She will also use the loan to be able to pay for the labor.  She will do this in order to be able to improve her house.  It rains a lot, and her house becomes flooded due to the rains.  This way she will be able to continue struggling to make her big dream come true.  Her dream is to buy a house made of sturdy material.

loans.use: to buy construction materials like nails, slats, and sheets of corrugated metal, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Linder

texts.es:
Linder vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, es un hombre con muchas ganas de salir adelante, a pesar de haber pasado muchas adversidades para poder tener su negocio de venta de comida, desde hace alrededor de 5 años, para Linder su negocio es muy importante porque le ha puesto mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio para poder llegar a ser conocido y sobre todo porque es su única fuentes de ingresos para poder sacar a su familia adelante.

Linder está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le ha  brindado el podrá comprar madera, pintura para poder re modelar su pequeño local y también para la compra de mesas, sillas, platos entre otros para su negocio, de esta manera brindara una mejor atención a sus clientes y seguirá trabajando para hacer realidad su gran sueño: “Tener una casa propia y brindarles una vida digna  a sus hijos”.
texts.en:
Linder lives in the city of Pucallpa.  He is a man with a great desire to get ahead in spite of having experienced a lot of adversities in order to be able to have his business of selling food.  He has had the business for around five years.  Linder’s business is very important to him because he has put forth great effort and sacrifice in order to become well-known.  Above all, it is important to him because it is his only source of income in order to get his family ahead.

Linder is very grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to the help they have provided for him, he will be able to buy wood and paint in order to be able to remodel his small place.  He will also buy tables, chairs, and plates, among other items for his business.  This way he will provide his customers with better service and continue working in order to make his big dream come true.  His dream is to have his own house and to provide his children with a decent life.

loans.use: to buy paint, wood, plates, chairs, and tables, among other items.

loans.name: Maria Nancy

texts.es:
Maria vive en la ciudad de Ica, estudia la carrera de enfermería y para poder solventar los gastos de sus estudios trabaja como ayudante de enfermería en una vivienda, así de esta manear puede salir adelante con mucho esfuerzo.

Maria esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo ella podrá solventar algunos gastos de sus estudios y de esta manera no tener inconvenientes para asistir a clases, así ella seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su sueño:” Terminar su carrera”.
texts.en:
Maria lives in the city of Ica.  She is studying nursing, and in order to be able to pay for her educational expenses she works as a nursing assistant at a home.  This way she is able to get ahead with great effort.

Maria is grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to their help, she will be able to pay some of her educational expenses.  This way she will not have difficulties attending classes.  This way she will continue struggling in order to be able to make her dream come true.  Her dream is to finish her degree.

loans.use: to pay for educational expenses.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis es un joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante, trabaja como empleado en una empresa textil de su ciudad desde hace 15 meses, gracias a su humilde trabajo puede tener ingresos para poder salir adelante, sobre todo porque es padre de un pequeño.

Luis está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le están brindando el podrá comprar materiales de construcción para poder mejorar la habitación donde habita, así podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Luis is a young man with a great desire to get ahead.  He has been working as an employee for a textile company in his city for 15 months.  Thanks to his humble work, he is able to have income in order to be able to get ahead.  This is most important because he has a little child.

Luis is grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to the help they are providing, he will be able to buy construction materials to improve the room where he lives.  This way he will be able to improve his quality of life.  He will continue struggling in order to be able to make his dream come true.  His dream is to have his own house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Yvette

texts.en:
Yvette is studying for a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration, majoring in Financial Management at Saint Vincent College. She wants to pursue her studies and with Gata Daku Multi-Purpose Cooperative (GDMPC), she finds it easy. 

Yvette borrowed a new loan from GDMPC to pay her school tuition fees for the second semester. 

In the future, she wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family.

loans.use: to pay her school tuition fees.

loans.name: Leonida

texts.en:
Leonida lives in Kisii, a banana and sugar cane growing area. She is married and has three children and has been farming for six years; she produces and sells milk.

Leonida chose Juhudi Kilimo for funding her because they have affordable interest rates on their loans, and the loan officers offer training to clients on asset finances so that they can choose assets that will bring better returns to them. During the training, she learned how to develop a savings culture.

Leonida says that with the income generated from this loan, she will be able to purchase poultry that will increase her income base and thus improve her family's living standards and pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to start a poultry project.

loans.name: Ursesia

texts.en: Ursesia is married to a farmer and lives in Dipolog City. She runs a general store to earn additional income for the family. She joined GDMPC and had borrowed a loan to purchase additional grocery goods to resell. She wants to improve her business and to be able to have a better life in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery goods to resell

loans.name: Reina

texts.en: Reina runs a general store while her husband is a farmer and works as carpenter at the same time. She has been selling different kinds of grocery goods in their community to make a living. After joining GDMPC this year, she borrowed a loan to purchase rice and corn grits to add her inventory. Improving her business is her determination and she want to make it possible.

loans.use: to purchase rice and corn grits to add to her her inventory

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es: juan vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el se dedica al cultivo de caña de azúcar, de hortalizas y tomates desde hace varios años, adicional a eso se dedica a la elaboración de dulce de panela, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra sacar adelante a su familia, Juan esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de abono para la caña de azúcar y una tomatera, también para darle mantenimiento a la molienda donde hace el dulce que es el que muestra la fotografía, asi obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Juan lives in his own house with his wife and their two children.  He has been growing sugarcane, vegetables, and tomatoes for several years.  In addition to this, he makes ‘dulce de panela’ [unrefined brown sugar wrapped in sugarcane leaves].  With what he gets from his work he manages to get his family ahead. 

Juan is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer for the sugarcane and tomato plants.  He will also use the loan to perform maintenance on the grinder where he makes the sweets, which is shown in the photograph.  This way he will get better income and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for the sugarcane and tomato plants and to perform maintenance on the grinder.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es: María de 68 años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida quien se dedica hacer viajes y su madre en casa propia; ella se dedica a la venta de pupusas desde hace varios años su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite elaborar las mejores pupusas y asi obtener las mejores ganancias, en las ultimas semanas aumentaron las ventas, a decidió aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital para sus compras por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz, quesillo, chicharrón, verduras, frijoles, etc. María tiene buenas referencias de pago, es muy responsable y agradece el apoyo, asegura que saldara la deuda y a la vez le dará a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Maria, age 68, lives with her life partner, whose business activity is travel, and her mother in her own house.  She has been selling ‘pupusas’ [stuffed tortillas] for several years.  Her business is located at her house.  This has given her very valuable experience that allows her to make the best pupusas.  This way she gets the best profits.  In the past weeks her sales have increased.  

She has decided to increase the production, but she needs capital to make her purchases.  That is why she is requesting a loan from Integral.  The loan will allow her to buy corn, soft cheese, fried pork rinds, vegetables, and beans, etc.  Maria has good payment references, and she is very responsible.  She is grateful for the support.  She is certain she will repay the debt and, at the same time, give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy corn, soft cheese, fried pork rinds, vegetables, and beans, etc

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy basic grains, instant products, candy, and drinks, etc.

loans.name: Maria Mercedes
