texts.es: Maria vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en casa propia, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad como granos básicos, detergentes, cafe, azucar, golosinas, refrescos, etc. su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia y eso le permite obtener mejores ganancias, quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital para poder realizarlo, por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar todo lo necesario para surtir su negocio y asi obtener mejores ganancias y poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en:
Maria lives with her husband and their two children in her own house.  She has a store where she sells basic needs items like basic grains, detergent, coffee, sugar, candy, and soft drinks, etc.  Her business is located at her house.  This allows her to get better profits.

She wants to expand the business and make a new investment.  However, she needs capital in order to be able to do so.  That is why she is requesting a loan that will allow her to buy all that she needs to stock her business.  This way she will get better earnings and be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, detergent, coffee, sugar, candy, and soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco vive en casa propia con sus padres, el se dedica a la agricultura siembra maíz y frijol y adicional a esto siembra hortalizas, tomates, chiles y ayote, tiene mas de 20 años de trabajar en la agricultura y ha ganado experiencia valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que lo prefieren porque todo lo que vende es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles y con un buen servicio; francisco solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla, abono, insecticida, fertilizantes, controles de plagas, herramientas, etc. para obtener mejores cosechas y asi tener una mejor estabilidad económica junto con sus padres.
texts.en:
Francisco lives with his parents in his own house. He works in agriculture growing corn and beans and also vegetables like tomatoes, chilies and squash. He has been working in agriculture for more than 20 years and has gained valuable experience that makes it possible for him to obtain the best crops.  He sells in all of the areas surrounding his community.  He has gotten a lot of customers who prefer him because everything that he sells is the best quality with affordable prices and good service.

Francisco is requesting a loan from Integral that will allow him to buy seeds, manure, insecticide, fertilizer, pest control, and tools, etc.   He will do this in order to obtain better crops so that he and his parents can have better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, insecticide, fertilizer, pest control, and tools, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Gladis

texts.es: Rosa de 40 años de edad se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de productos de uso personal como lociones, desodorantes, perfumes, cremas, etc. su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar los gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo, la clienta desea acrecentar su negocio por eso solicta un credito que le permita poder comprar todo lo necesario como: perfumes, esmaltes para uñas, desodorantes, cremas, lociones, etc todo por mayor, ya que tiene mucha clientela por dar sus productos a precios accesibles con la ayuda solicitada ella podra obtener mejores ganancias y asi seguira dandole a su familia lo que necesita sin limitacion alguna
texts.en:
Rosa, age 40, sells all types of personal use products like lotions, deodorants, perfumes, and creams, etc.  She has had her business for several years, and it is located in her house.  With the income that she gets from her sales, and with the help of her husband, they manage to pay the household expenses.  She lives in her own house with her husband and her son.

Rosa wishes to expand her business.  That is why she is requesting a loan that will allow her to be able to buy everything needed like perfume, nail polish, deodorant, cream, and lotion, etc.  She will buy everything wholesale.  She has a lot of clientele because she sells her products at affordable prices.  With the requested help she will be able to get better income.  This way she will continue giving her family what it needs without any limitation.

loans.use: to buy lotions, deodorants, perfumes, and creams, etc.

loans.name: Melvin Eliezar

texts.es: Melvin de 30 años de edad vive con su grupo familiar conformado por sus dos hijos y su esposa, el se dedica a la venta de ajo, comercializa de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Melvin esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de ajos por mayor para poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y así poderle dar a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Melvin, age 30, lives with his family, which is comprised of his wife and their two children.  He sells garlic in an itinerant manner in the different neighborhoods that are close to his house.  With what he gets from his profits his manages to pay some of the household expenses.

Melvin is requesting a loan to buy garlic in bulk in order to be able to continue with his work.  This is his only source of income.  This way he will be able to give his family what they need without any limitation.

loans.use: to buy garlic in bulk.

loans.name: Ana Yesica

texts.es: Ana vive en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella posee una tienda en la cual comercializa productos de primera necesidad como: pan, leche, huevos, alimentos enlatados, agua embotellada, verduras y otros productos más. Ella es una persona muy responsable y amable la cual cuenta con varios clientes a pesar que su tienda no tiene mucha variedad de productos. Ana solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para comprar mayor cantidad de productos, ya que el mayor deseo de ella es el de poder surtir su negocio y así percibir mayores ganancias. Ella es una madre de familia muy responsable quien desea mucho poder brindarle todo lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
Ana lives in her own house with her husband and their two children.  She has a store where she sells basic needs products like bread, milk, eggs, canned goods, bottled water, vegetables, and other products.  She is a very responsible and kind person.  She has many customers even though her store does not have a big variety of products.

Ana is requesting a loan in order to be able to have the money needed to buy a greater quantity of products.  Her biggest wish is to be able to stock her business.  This way she will get greater income.  She is a very responsible mother who greatly wishes to be able to give her family all of the best.

loans.use: to buy bread, milk, eggs, canned goods, bottled water, vegetables, and other products.

loans.name: Norma Isabel

texts.es: Norma de 39 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus pequeños hijos. Norma se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza, pan dulce y pollos. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante y de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Desea construir un cuarto para la cocina y pavimentar la entrada principal de su vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro, grava y pago de mano de obra para construir el cuarto para la cocina y para pavimentar el piso de la entrada de la vivienda.
texts.en:
Norma, age 39, lives in her own house with her husband and their small children.  She sells beauty products, sweet bread, and chickens.  She sells in an itinerant manner.  This way she earns a living and supports her family.

She wishes to build a room for the kitchen and to pave the main entrance to her house.  That is why she is requesting this loan from FUSAI.  She will use the loan to buy bricks, cement, sand, iron, and gravel.  She will also pay for the labor to build the room for the kitchen and for paving the floor of the entrance to her house.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, iron, and gravel and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Gregoria De Jesus

texts.es: Gregoria de 49 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus hijos. Ella se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace mucho tiempo y junto a su esposo quien es agricultor llevan la economía del hogar. Gregoria desea construir un cuarto dormitorio para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro y lámina galvanizada para construir el cuarto dormitorio.
texts.en:
Gregoria, age 49, lives in her own house with her husband and their children.  She has been providing domestic services for a long time.  Together with her husband, a farmer, they support their household.

Gregoria wishes to build a bedroom.  That is why she is requesting this loan from FUSAI.  She will buy bricks, cement, sand, iron, and galvanized metal sheeting in order to build the bedroom.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, iron, and galvanized metal sheeting in order to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Ana Milagro

texts.es: Ana de 38 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo e hijos y se dedica al comercio de tienda desde hace mucho tiempo. Junto a su esposo llevan la economía del hogar  y hacen todo lo que este a su alcance para dar a sus hijos mejores condiciones. Ana desea mejorar la entrada de su vivienda ya que cuando llueve se hace charco dificultando la entrada al hogar. Desea encementar esta parte de la entrada lo antes posible ya que cuando es invierno es muy difícil entrar. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena, grava y pago de mano de obra.
texts.en:
Ana, age 38, lives in her own house with her husband and children.  Her business is a store, which she has had for a long time.  She and her husband support their household together.  They do everything they can to give their children the best conditions.

Ana wishes to improve the entrance to her house.  When it rains a puddle forms, and this makes it difficult to enter her home.  She wishes to expand this part of the entrance as soon as possible because it is very difficult to enter in the winter.  In order to do so, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI.  She will use the loan to buy cement, sand, and gravel and to pay for the labor.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and gravel and to pay for the labor to expand the entrance to her house.

loans.name: Milagro Del Carmen

texts.es: Milagro de 35 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar. Milagro se gana la vida por medio de la venta de variedad de verduras las cuales vende de manera ambulante desde hace mucho tiempo. Milagro desea invertir en material más resistente para la cubierta del techo ya que es de madera y desea cambiarlo por polines para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los polines para hacer el cambio del techo lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Milagro, age 35, lives in her own house with her family.  Milagro earns a living by selling a variety of vegetables in an itinerant manner.  She has been doing this for a long time.

Milagro wishes to invest in more resilient material for the covering of her roof.  It is now wood, and she wishes to change it for purlins.  That is why she is requesting this loan from FUSAI.  She will use the loan to buy the purlins in order to make the change as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy the purlins to change the covering of the roof of her house.

loans.name: Rodolfo Antonio

texts.es: Rodolfo de 52 años de edad y su esposa viven desde hace diez años en casa propia. Rodolfo conduce un taxi y es así como se gana la vida. Él tiene la necesidad de cambiar la lámina del techo de su vivienda ya que está muy deteriorado también necesita construir un muro pequeño de ladrillo de barro en el corredor de su vivienda. Por lo anterior solicitó a FUSAI un crédito para comprar toda la lámina galvanizada, ladrillo de obra para el muro, hierro, cemento, arena y grava. Rodolfo conciente de su compromiso con FUSAI manifiesta que pagará puntualmente con las cuotas que este implica.
texts.en:
Rodolfo, age 52, and his wife have lived in their own house for ten years.  Rodolfo drives a taxi, and that is how he earns a living.

He needs to change the corrugated metal sheeting on his roof because it is damaged.  He also needs to build a small brick wall in the hallway of his house.  That is why he requested a loan from FUSAI to buy galvanized metal sheeting, bricks for the wall, rebar, cement, sand, and gravel.  Rodolfo, aware of his obligation to FUSAI, says that he will make his payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheeting, bricks for the wall, rebar, cement, sand, and gravel.

loans.name: Tomas Roberto

texts.es: Tomas de 53 años de edad y su compañera de vida tienen una hija menor de edad. Él trabaja de motorista y con su compañera atienden un pequeño negocio de cría y venta de pollos. Tomas desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y dar mayor seguridad a su familia, él ha solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para reparar el techo y comprar lámina de acero recubierta de aluminio y zinc para cubrir una superficie de 80 metros cuadrado; además encementar el piso del corredor y la cocina. Tomas tiene un buen récord crediticio con otras instituciones.
texts.en:
Tomas, age 53, and his life partner have a minor daughter.  He works as a driver.  He and his life partner have a small business of raising and selling chickens.

Tomas wishes to improve the conditions of his house and to make his family safer.  He has requested a loan from FUSAI in order to repair the roof and to buy corrugated metal sheeting covered with aluminum and zinc in order to cover the surface of 80 square meters.  He also wants to pour concrete flooring in the hall and the kitchen.  Tomas has a good credit record with other institutions.

loans.use: to buy corrugated metal sheeting, cement, sand, and gravel, and to pour concrete on the floors in the hall and the kitchen of his house.

loans.name: Gilma Edith

texts.es: Gilma de 19 años de edad está acompañada y tiene una hija de 1 año de edad, Gilma y su compañero de vida viven en casa propia y están esforzándose para sacar adelante a su pequeña hija. Gilma está dentro del negocio de su familia quienes se dedican a comprar y vender carne de cerdos; con lo que ella gana y lo que su compañero de vida aporta, están deseosos de mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda pero no tienen el capital completo para ello. Gilma al conocer de los servicios que FUSAI tiene, les solicitó un crédito e invertir ese dinero en la reparación del techo de su vivienda (32 metros cuadrados) y encementar el piso de una habitación de aproximadamente 12 metros cuadrado. Gilma consiente del compromiso que esto implica solventará puntualmente con las cuotas de este crédito.
texts.en:
Gilma, age 19, is in a relationship and has a one year old daughter.  Gilma and her life partner live in their own house.  They are putting forth great effort to get their little daughter ahead.  Gilma works in the family business of buying and selling pork.  

With what she earns and with what her life partner contributes, they wish to improve the conditions of their house.  However, they do not have all of the money to do so.  Upon learning about the services that FUSAI offers, she requested a loan to repair the roof of her house (32 square meters) and to pour a concrete floor in a room that is approximately 12 square meters.  Gilma is aware of the obligation of the loan and will make her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheeting, nails, wood, cement, sand, and gravel to repair the roof and to pour a cement floor in a room of her house.

loans.name: Alfonso Edgardo

texts.es: Alfonso de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida quienes han procreado 2 hijos. Alfonso se está esforzando por finalizar la vivienda la que actualmente como se aprecia en la fotografía le hace falta instalar la estructura de techo y la cubierta de aproximadamente 70 metros cuadrado. Para hacerlo a solicitado un crédito a FUSAI y así comprar los materiales como lámina de acero revestida de aluminio y zinc, polin C de 4 pulgadas y demás accesorios para este trabajo. Alfonso se compromete a solventar la deuda que este crédito implica.
texts.en:
Alfonso, age 34, lives in his own house with his life partner and their two children.  Alfonso is putting forth great effort to finish his house.  As can be seen in the photograph, it needs the roof structure and the covering of approximately 70 square meters.

In order to do this he is requesting a loan from FUSAI.  He will use the loan to buy the materials like laminated metal sheeting covered in aluminum and zinc, four inch C beams, and other accessories for this job.  Alfonso pledges to repay this loan.

loans.use: to buy laminated metal sheeting covered in aluminum and zinc, four inch C beams, and other accessories for the roof of his house.
